column2: "Afei nkɔnhyɛfo mba yernom no mu ɔbaa bi kekaa mu frɛɛ Elisha

column4: W’akowaa mo kun no oewu: na ɔwoara inyim dɛ nna w’akowaa suro EWURADZE: na afei ɔdzefirfo no aba rebɛfa me mba beenu akɛyɛ no nkowaa."

column3: Ebɛnadze na menyɛ mma wo? Ka kyerɛ me; ebɛnadze na ewɔ no wɔ wo fie? Na ɔsee dɛ
column4: W’afonabaa nnyi adze biara wɔ fie dɛ ngo ehina ara."

column5: Fa ehina bi so brɛ me. Na ɔsee no dɛ

column2: "Na aber a odur Nyame nyimpa no nkyɛn wɔ koko no do no

column5: na ɔannka annkyerɛ me."

column2: "Na abofra no ne na no see dɛ

column5: na ɔdze ne nsa totoo ne nsamu: na ɔkotoow no do; na abofra no no honam yɛɛ hyew."

Kɛfrɛ Sunamnyi no ma ɔmbra. Nna ɔkɛfrɛɛ no. Na ɔbaa ne nkyɛn no

column2: "Na Elisha baa Gilgal bio: na ɔkɔm aba asaase no do; na nkɔnhyɛfo mba no tsetse n’enyim: na ɔsee n’akowaa dɛ
column3: Fa ɔsɛn kɛse no si do
column4: na noa edziban ma nkɔnhyɛfo mba no."

column2: "Na ɔbaako fiir edzi kɔr haban mu dɛ ɔrekɛtsew fan
